termsAndCondition.text: Welcome to the forum! Ask the community for some guidance!

termsAndCondition.heading: Privacy Policy
termsAndCondition.text: All of the information that you provided can be read and retrieve by the moderator and the community. Please NEVER PROVIDE ANY PERSONAL INFORMATION SUCH AS EMAILS. Be anonymous at all times.

termsAndCondition.heading: Purpose of the forum
termsAndCondition.text: The forum is added to provide additional aid from the other users. It is meant for convenience and not a replacement for social media. The usage of the forum is quite strict, users can't reply to another replier after one minute, and the user must NOT REPLY AT LEASE 5 MINS TO MAKE A THREAD.

termsAndCondition.heading: Forum rules
termsAndCondition.text: All chats must not contain anything such as spam, implicit content, malicious intent, bad words, and others. Remain courteous and kind to anyone in the forum. Every chat can be read by anyone including the forum moderator.
